import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-projects', templateUrl: './projects.component.html', styleUrls: ['./projects.component.css'] }) export class ProjectsComponent { featuredProject = { name: "Dynamic HRMS Management System", description: `A modern enterprise HRMS solution that unifies attendance, payroll, leave, and performance modules under a single responsive system. Designed for scalability and real-time integration between HR and management dashboards.`, techStack: ["Angular", "PHP", "MySQL", "CodeIgniter"], image: "assets/projects/hrms.jpg", link: "#" }; projects = [ { name: "UbiCRM â€” Customer Relationship Management", description: `A dynamic CRM system that helps businesses manage leads, deals, and analytics through an intuitive dashboard with real-time data insights.`, techStack: ["Angular 17", "AdonisJS", "MySQL"], image: "assets/projects/crm.jpg", link: "#" }, { name: "Organization Management Platform", description: `A centralized management system for onboarding, subscriptions, and workflow automation, improving process accuracy and reducing manual work.`, techStack: ["AngularJS", "PHP (CodeIgniter)", "MySQL"], image: "assets/projects/organization.jpg", link: "#" } ]; }
